I like it enough that I’m planning on modifying it instead of returning it, but the sleeves are just attached too far out. They just won’t stay on my shoulders. The front is all elastic, so it doesn’t really fall or anything, but I can only really wear this with bare shoulders, with the sleeves starting on my upper arm. Doable, but not what I want.  That being said, the material is nice enough, and it seems to be well-made enough, although I haven’t had a chance to wear it enough to say yet.

评论概述: Cute in Theory—but White is SEE THROUGH
评论详情: I really wanted this dress to work out & was planning on using for a maternity shoot. For $40+ I expected better. Even with a lining, the lining is too thin to really do anything. Yes, you could add another skin toned layer or skirt, but up close you can totally see everything even after doing that. The shape and fit of the dress is adorable, unfortunately the thin material of the white color makes it unwearable. :( for reference I am 5’3, size small typically, but 30 weeks pregnant.

I bought this to be a modest dress for church. I wanted the green gingham dress but the on fabric that came, the gingham was so small and the green was so faded that it made the whole dress appear grey. The fabric was also very see-through and i could see my dark underwear immediately through the skirt. The location of the bow ties also threw me off… they were around the bust when i felt like they should have been sewn on below the elastic area to cinch the waist. It looked so-so on but i can’t constitute spending this amount of money of such a poorly made dress. Wish it would have worked because the length of the skirt, the puff sleeves, and style were all really great.

Super cute! The fabric did feel a bit cheap and although it was very lightweight it didn't feel breathable. Overall I was happy with the purchase and would buy again due to the ease of breastfeesing in this dress.

You are large chested. Literally not enough to cover the girls regardless of support. I had to cut the sleeves off and wear it as a skirt because I bought it for Easter to match my family. I’m breastfeeding, and even if I was not, this did not offer enough coverage for my chest even if I spun it around. Also it cannot be worn over the shoulders. The sleeves were beautiful, but if you do not want to shoe your shoulders out if you are a DD and above, pass on this dress.
the fit was spot on

Very cute dress. Material is not see-through, seems very well-made. you could wear the straight out of the bag without any ironing. It can be worn over the shoulder or off shoulders as depicted in the pictures. Really cute little bow detail in the back as well. Sleeve length is 3/4.

I bought this dress thinking it would be good to wear to my baby shower. It fit okay but it did not have as much stretch as I thought it would. 评论概述: I really wanted to like this but ultimately returned it
评论详情: The pros: the blue cotton fabric is actually quite nice. It's a nice lightweight dotted cotton and it would be wonderful for a hot summer day. Not too sheer, semi-lined between waist and knee. Sleeves are voluminous with the right amount of elastic.  The cons: the "sash" is attached to the bust which is a useless place to be attached - it should be under the bust. The smocked top was actually looser than I'd anticipated and didn't provide support -- which is unfortunate because even when you wear the sleeves up, you can't wear a bra with the dress.  If the sash was in the correct place, I probably would have kept the dress and tried made it work for casual summer wear. But re-sewing it seemed like too much for the quality and the slightly unflattering bust.

I uploaded pictures of the dress with and without styling. It's pretty basic. Not too thin or thick. The pattern texture is not noticeable from a distance but I don't particularly love it. As a thicker person I found this hard to style on me. The ties are very much too short to tie a bow or anything except a knot and I wish they had just cut them off.  Very much not worth the money since it's just a very simple dress with elastic top section, but that's Amazon for you. It looked decent on me.
